comments: The associated Pisano series starts as in A001175, but differs for example for modulus 29 where it is 7, not 14. - _R. J. Mathar_, Nov 02 2011
links: H. Zhao and X. Li, On the Fibonacci numbers of trees, Fib. Quart., 44 (2006), 32-38.
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1, 1).
formula: a(n) = 4*F(n)+F(n-2).G.f.: (4+5x)/(1-x-x^2). - _Philippe Del√©ham_, Nov 19 2008a(n)= Fibonacci(n-2)+Fibonacci(n+5). - _Gary Detlefs_, Mar 31 2012
